posts.name: Aditya Pharwa
posts.cooked:
The average of the best 5 out of 6 completed assignments comes out to be 86.2. Please review this calculation, instructors. The current average shown (82.00) appears to be incorrect.
@carlton

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
I have informed the relevant people in operations. The fix is not instant. So it will take a little time to sort through. Thanks for brining it to our attention, because it affected you, it might have affected others as well, so we have to do a script check to find the reason for the error.

Kind regards

posts.name: Anupam Chandra
posts.cooked: @carlton, the problem in the script is that it is not taking the best 5 out of 6. It is taking the total of all 6 assignments and dividing the total by 6.

posts.name: Palash_H
posts.cooked: Same here @carlton my average assignment score is 57.0 which is incorrectly displayed as 55.0.

posts.name: Sarath S Pillai
posts.cooked: Yea. It affected my score also. Seems like affected everyone

posts.name: Rithika R
posts.cooked: Same for me . It has affected my score too.

posts.name: Avni Shah
posts.cooked: Same for me. My average of best 5 comes out to be 94 while the score appearing on dashboard is only 90.

posts.name: grandpa tomazo
posts.cooked: same for me , the week 1 and week 2 scores are not displaying nor added.

posts.name: Rajat Shenoi
posts.cooked:
To be honest, it doesn’t matter. Because 10% of the graded assignment is taken. 10% of 90 is 9 and 10% of 94 is 9.4 which will be rounded to 9.

The score will remain unchanged. (I have the same situation. 88 should become 94, but it doesn’t matter)

posts.name: Avni Shah
posts.cooked: I don’t think there’s round offs on an individual level… just the final score.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: Roundups happen on almost all assignments and even on projects and on the final T score. There is a general tendency to give the student the benefit. Also the corrected scores have not been pushed as there is a system wide fix for all students. The rescores will be pushed today after 10 am
